name: Freeze World VR
description:
Description

  Freeze World VR is harmony VR game. It will give you the opportunity to immerse yourself in unusual low-poly style. Where time is freeze and you can manipulate world. Each world is a different topic. From the past to future or any fantasy world. Time period has its own world, not like the others, but it specifically resembles this time passage.

   In the game, you can feel relaxed. You can manipulate, interact and much more. 

   The game has more than 250 objects with which you can manipulate. You can change variant of objects, customizate charter. Interact with more than 80% objects.

You can walk around world using smooth locomotion or use Climbing Axe.

Game Features
  • Interact

The game has more than 250 interact staff.

  • World

Different worlds  with different things and funny thing.

  • Felleng

In the game you will relax.

  • Freedom

In the game you can almost anything you want, but if it is not, you can write to us and we will do what most players want. Because we respect your desires.
